channel.title: Bots on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Bots on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Bots are hot - again
item.description: The title of the post is taken from a 1996 Wired article by Andrew Leonard describing the state of automated systems in the dot-com era. Web robots â€“ spiders, wanderers, and worms. Cancelbots, Lazarus, and Automoose. Chatterbots, softbots, userbots, taskbots, knowbots, and mailbots. MrBot and MrsBot. Warbots, clonebots, floodbots, annoybots, hackbots, and Vladbots. Gaybots, gossipbots, and gamebots. Skeleton bots, spybots, and sloth bots. Xbots and meta-bots. Eggdrop bots. Motorcycle bull dyke bots.
